title: Your fav champ is now the new night guard at FNaF.
body:
How does the champ survive?

{{champion:74}} Turrets.

replies.body: 5 Animatronics, 15 stacks by the end of shift. {{champion:75}}

I have multiple favorites
{{champion:67}} She's a night hunter, she'd just spot them in the halls, shoot 'em, move on.
{{champion:4}} Uh...... uuuuuuuuuuhhhh..... he'd stun them?
{{champion:8}} He'd just hide in a pool of blood for the whole night.
{{champion:4}}  ult to the bar, ult back at 5:59
Doesn't TF's ult give him vision of the enemy team? That would mean he'd only ever have to use power on the doors.
{{champion:53}} no problem here
{{champion:112}}  I accept them with love
{{champion:222}} I imagine she'll just be messing with them the entire time.

{{champion:17}} 
Invis until 6
{{champion:154}} Doesn't give a fudge.
{{champion:31}} Have fun trying to stuff that thing into a suit without getting eaten Freddy

{{champion:17}} 
Can't kill what they can't see.
{{champion:101}}   Ends up getting fired for "Obliterating Animatronics".
{{champion:62}}  2 words. Decoy. LOL.
{{champion:105}} Use troll pole whenever one of the animatronics comes for him.
{{champion:53}}  silly freddy i am not blitzcrank

{{champion:57}} 

Get Saplings to watch every little corner. Anything gets close, he throws more saplings at it until it goes away.
{{champion:33}} so the animatronics come alive at night huh? (Que benny hill music with rammus powerballing after freddy and the gang)
{{champion:50}} would come up with some really clever strategy so the animatronics could never find him. Or you know, he'll just morph and eat them.

{{champion:254}}  punches them
I don't play him but it's necessary:
{{champion:30}}  *R*

Psh {{champion:29}} will open a Twitch e Cheeses

GG

Have a few.

{{champion:268}} knows a thing or two about soulless animated constructs.  Freddy and Co. spend the nights hanging around with Azir's soldier dudes while Azir contemplates a Shurima-themed restaurant.

{{champion:10}} sits in a bubble all night calmly watching cameras and playing Sudoku.  Is generally assumed to be a new animatronic anyway because she's covered in metal.

{{champion:25}} Dark Binds anything that gets close.  Eventually gets fired after a child steps in a leftover patch of Tormented Soil.

{{champion:7}} never actually shows up for work, sends an illusory double instead.  Freddy is confused.  Is fired after she's caught working for three other places at the same time.

{{champion:143}} has two doors and two murderplants.  She buys a sunlamp for her room and sunbathes while murderplants keep the animatronics away.

{{champion:102}} has no idea how that fire started on her shift, Officer.

> [{quoted}](name=Trylobyte,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=e1kFJlTk,comment-id=0034,timestamp=2014-12-23T14:23:12.936+0000)
>
> Have a few.
> 
> {{champion:268}} knows a thing or two about soulless animated constructs.  Freddy and Co. spend the nights hanging around with Azir's soldier dudes while Azir contemplates a Shurima-themed restaurant.
> 
> {{champion:10}} sits in a bubble all night calmly watching cameras and playing Sudoku.  Is generally assumed to be a new animatronic anyway because she's covered in metal.
> 
> {{champion:25}} Dark Binds anything that gets close.  Eventually gets fired after a child steps in a leftover patch of Tormented Soil.
> 
> {{champion:7}} never actually shows up for work, sends an illusory double instead.  Freddy is confused.  Is fired after she's caught working for three other places at the same time.
> 
> {{champion:143}} has two doors and two murderplants.  She buys a sunlamp for her room and sunbathes while murderplants keep the animatronics away.
> 
> {{champion:102}} has no idea how that fire started on her shift, Officer.

Hold on a second...
{{champion:10}} 
YOU CAN USE KAYLE?!?!
IMPOSSIBLE!
{{champion:26}} Just goes back in time to prepare himself for whenever he runs out of power, or gets caught. WHO NEEDS DOORS?
You can't killean the Zilean.

> [{quoted}](name=epicdoomer,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=e1kFJlTk,comment-id=002e,timestamp=2014-12-21T00:00:04.153+0000)
>
> {{champion:26}} Just goes back in time to prepare himself for whenever he runs out of power, or gets caught. WHO NEEDS DOORS?

Then he'll get caught again or run out of power again.
I mean, when he gets caught, or runs out of power, he goes back in time.

> [{quoted}](name=epicdoomer,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=e1kFJlTk,comment-id=002e00000000,timestamp=2014-12-23T04:49:08.919+0000)
>
> I mean, when he gets caught, or runs out of power, he goes back in time.

OHHH... Got it.

{{champion:37}} : build mage, stuns, shrecks.
Battlecast Prime {{champion:31}} : MAXIMUM CHO'GATH omnomnomnom.

Hmm...

{{champion:32}}: Automatically destroys any animatronics that get too close.

{{champion:34}}: Wall the doors.

{{champion:10}}: R.

{{champion:112}}, {{champion:6}}, {{champion:61}}, {{champion:111}}, {{champion:82}}, {{champion:53}}: Assumed to be new animatronics. Alternatively, cannot be effectively stuffed in a suit, for various reasons.

Honestly? I really love {{champion:421}} right now.

She probably just tunnels the fuck out of there.

Conversely, she goes graboid on Freddy and Co., becoming the haunt herself.

{{champion:45}} with his E as protection.

Just hope he doesn't destroy anything or else he's fired.

Or just blow them up like no tomorrow, fuck this shit!
{{champion:112}} My Brothers!
{{champion:56}}  I am the night
The animatronics will be the ones trying to survive against Syndra.{{champion:134}}

i dont really have a "favorite" so ill just list the ones that i think of
{{champion:119}} makes a show of cutting all of those machines in half
{{champion:122}}  dunk
{{champion:161}} lazorz
{{champion:82}} he got fired cause he just broke a couple of the anamtronics and made the scraps fly around him as he decimated the rest

{{champion:62}} 

Press R to raze entire building.
{{champion:238}} Kinda self-explanatory.

How doesn't he survive?
{{champion:86}} 
Spin to win!

I mean, he'll get fired after the first night due to the amount of damage he causes to those haunted monstrosities, but he'll live.
{{champion:19}}  does not use any power. just smell them when they come near. Then ults them while doing the thriller over there dead bodies
{{champion:102}} stares back at them in dragon form.
annie got new toys{{champion:1}}

{{champion:42}}  Just guard the entire place outside with the chopper. No big deal.
{{champion:112}} "Destroy. . . then improve!"

{{champion:268}} Let's talk all three FNaF games.
1 - Use his two soldiers to guard the doors
2 - Use his two soldiers to guard the vents, while Emperor's Divide blocks the hallway
3 - Rinse and repeat. "THE ORDER IS GIVEN!"
{{champion:90}} Voidlings to scout.  Silence, Suppress
{{champion:421}} Who needs lights? Also, considering what she can do to Blitz, those soulbound furry machines are done for.
{{champion:112}} Weld the doors shut with arm lazer
{{champion:99}} Destroy them with LASERS!
{{champion:14}}  *looks down at them* /laugh

{{champion:39}}  4 blades and only 2 doors? Child's play
{{champion:131}} She pulls them in with her e and tears them apart with her w
{{champion:78}} Nobody will mess with lolipoppy. Nobody.
{{champion:267}} They only have a narrow hallway to come through. Freddy comes ambling down towards the guards office only to be met with a miniature, indoor tsunami.
{{champion:84}} W
